titles.title: A concurrent resolution condemning the use of plastic or rubber bullets by British security forces in Northern Ireland and calling upon the Government of the United Kingdom to end the use of such bullets against civilians.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Arms Control, International Security and Science.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

committee.subcommittee: Arms Control, International Security and Science
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Condemns the use of plastic or rubber bullets by British security forces in Northern Ireland. Calls upon the Government of the United Kingdom to end the use of such bullets against civilians.
